sense.gloss: (total) number (of people or things), count, quota

sdata.j: いつも、いつも↑員数↑↓|いんずう|↓↑合↑↓あ↓わせなどと↑言↑↓い↓われないで、たまには↑嘘↑↓うそ↓でも↑良↑↓よ↓いから↑一騎当千↑↓いっきとうせん↓の↑兵↑↓へい↓と↑言↑↓い↓ってほしいよ。
sdata.e: You always ask me to join your team because you need one more guy. Come on - just once I'd like you to say it's because I alone am worth ten of them - even if it is a lie.

sdata.j: ↑忘↑↓わす↓れずに↑出席↑↓しゅっせき↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓の↑員数↑↓|いんずう|↓をかぞえなさい。
sdata.e: Don't forget to count how many people attend.
